00025 #ifndef __MemoryManager_H__
00026 #define __MemoryManager_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
00029 #include "OgreStdHeaders.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032 
00056     class _OgreExport MemoryManager
00057     {
00058     public:        
00059         static MemoryManager sMemManager;
00060 
00061     public:
00062         MemoryManager();
00063         ~MemoryManager();
00064 
00067         void *allocMem( const char *szFile, size_t uLine, size_t count ) throw ( );
00068 
00071         void *rllocMem( const char *szFile, size_t uLine, void *ptr , size_t count ) throw ( );
00072 
00075         void *cllocMem( const char *szFile, size_t uLine, size_t num, size_t size ) throw ( );
00076 
00079         void dllocMem( const char *szFile, size_t uLine, void *ptr ) throw ( );
00080     };
00081 
00082 } // namespace
00083 
00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 // Overridden global new([])/delete([]) functions
00086 //
00087 inline void *operator new( size_t count ) throw( )
00088 {
00089     return ::Ogre::MemoryManager::sMemManager.allocMem( "", 0, count );
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline void *operator new[]( size_t count ) throw( )
00093 {    
00094     return ::Ogre::MemoryManager::sMemManager.allocMem( "", 0, count );
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline void operator delete( void* ptr ) throw( )
00098 {
00099     ::Ogre::MemoryManager::sMemManager.dllocMem( "", 0, ptr );
00100 }
00101 
00102 inline void operator delete[]( void* ptr ) throw( )
00103 {
00104     ::Ogre::MemoryManager::sMemManager.dllocMem( "", 0, ptr );
00105 }
00106 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107

00109 // This header adds the *alloc/free macros, wrapping the C functions
00110 #include "OgreMemoryMacros.h"
00111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
